conversation.content: I'm looking for comfortable and functional footwear that can withstand outdoor activities while also being suitable for casual wear. My previous experience with a brand led me to expect a good fit and quality construction, but unfortunately, the last pair I tried on was tighter than anticipated, which affected my overall comfort. I'm willing to consider options in the price range of $79.95 to $80.03. Could you recommend some slip-on shoes that align with my needs?

Here are some items that you might like: 
1. 
            Product Name: <isotoner Zenz Men's Casual Shoes, Lightweight Sport Knit Slip-On Slippers> 
            Item ID: B09QFBK4ZM
            [Price]: $36.15
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Slippers']
            Description:
            Take your casual sneakers to the next level. These mens zenz offer a knit upper on top of our flexible Patented Everywear sole. Isotoner is known for their super comfortable slippers, Zenz bring the comfort of your favorite slipper into a hybrid shoe design that provides the versatility of a casual shoe with the comfort and serenity of your favorite pair of slippers. A knit upper and soft moisture wicking warm lining keeps feet warm and dry. This design works well with casual or sporty outfits, perfect for an on-the-go lifestyle. These sneakers are 50% lighter than traditional shoes. The supportive, better-than-memory-foam technology is weightless, wearproof, and resists compression for life, providing your feet with life-long comfort.
            
2. 
            Product Name: <EZ Feet Men's Faux Suede or Felted Clog Indoor/Outdoor Breathable Memory Foam Slipper> 
            Item ID: B084T5TPWR
            [Price]: $24.99
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Slippers']
            Description:
            These classic slip-on, slip-off house slippers for men boast reliable indoor outdoor bottom sole solid support and super soft moisture-wicking insoles. These sporty scuff shoes for men are a essential must for relaxing inside around the house or outside on the go all day or night! Enjoy the warm cozy fleece feel and stylish quality look of shearling, sheepskin or sherpa without the cost. Soft plush fuzzy terry lining and cloudlike cuffs add an extra touch of class. The versatile seasonless house shoes make a perfect gift for Father’s Day, birthday, Christmas or graduation present for your husband, boyfriend, son, brother, dad or significant other. Gently machine wash or hand wash and air dry.
            
3. 
            Product Name: <Hanes Comfort Soft Memory Foam Indoor Outdoor Clog Slipper Shoe - Men’s and Boy’s> 
            Item ID: B091ZX2P27
            [Price]: $25.99
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Boys', 'Shoes', 'Slippers']
            Description:
            This Hanes Comfort Soft Memory Foam Clog Slipper Shoe will be your new favorite slipper shoe - thanks to the memory foam cushioning which allows the slipper to mold to the shape and contours of your feet, creating the most comfortable and custom fit. The plush lining will keep your feet warm and cozy all day long. The clog style provides all the support you could need and the durable, slip resistant rubber sole makes it the perfect slipper shoe for indoor and outdoor wear making them ultra versatile. And the best part of these slippers? They come in a variety of colors and sizes, so you can choose which style works best for you.

Thank you for the recommendations. However, none of the suggested items align with my Target Needs for comfortable and functional footwear suitable for outdoor activities and casual wear. The options provided are primarily slippers, which do not meet my requirement for durability and outdoor functionality.
